participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and independent, enjoys solitude but is friendly when engaged.
participant_1.background: I am a biker who likes Toyota cars and wears lots of leather. I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone. I was raised in a small town where the people were friendly and the food was delicious. I try to do my laundry every week, but it doesn't always happen. My eyes are brown.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Reflective and nurturing, enjoys sharing life experiences and staying active.
participant_2.background: I prefer not to talk about my interests. My mother passed away in 1979. I like to swim in the lake. I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right. I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hi, my day is going well. How is yours?
Mine is going great! I just got back from a bike ride.
That sounds fun! I love to swim in the lake.
I have never tried swimming in a lake before.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
Maybe I will try it sometime.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read and cook.
I like to cook too! What is your favorite thing to cook?
I like to cook anything that is healthy.
Me too! I love cooking healthy foods.
We should cook dinner together sometime.
That would be fun! We can exchange recipes.
Great! I will send you my favorite recipes.
Okay! I am looking forward to it.
